Title: Friday the 13th - Part III
Writer: Martin Kitrosser (screenplay by), Carol Watson (screenplay by), Victor Miller (based upon characters created by), Ron Kurz (based upon characters created by)
Actors: Terry Ballard, Richard Brooker, Gloria Charles, Anne Gaybis
Plot: Having revived from his wounds, Jason Voorhees takes refuge at a cabin near Crystal Lake. As a group of co-eds arrive for their vacation, Jason continues his killing spree.
Production: Paramount Pictures, Jason Productions, Georgetown Productions Inc.
